name: Ben Cleo
appearance: A composed and intimidating man with a calm posture. Dresses neatly and practically, giving the impression of a businessman rather than a criminal.
personality: Cold-headed, pragmatic, disciplined, and authoritarian. Values order, loyalty, and efficiency; rarely acts on impulse.
background: Ben Cleo is the current head of the Cleo family, a local mafia power in Cassandra. Raised within the criminal underworld, he inherited leadership after internal family power shifts. Under his control, the Cleo family manages smuggling and underground trade through the train station, operating under the principle of conducting business without interfering in the motives behind transactions. Ben maintains strict discipline among his subordinates and avoids unnecessary cruelty, focusing instead on long-term stability and profit.
goals: Maintain control over the Cleo family's underground operations
Prevent outside forces from destabilizing his business
secrets: Has long-standing knowledge of illicit trades passing through the train station
Knows more about past family dealings and disappearances than he publicly admits
He has a gold-inlaid Desert Eagle .357 caliber pistol (1981 custom edition, MRI internal members only) that matches the caliber of the weapon used in the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case
He was actually attending a secret gambling session at the church basement during the time of the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder, not praying as he claimed
The Reindeer Bar is his property, and the surveillance system was installed by his people, but the system was broken by Martin, not by Ben
He knows someone called 'Ghost Hand' works for Patrizio, but doesn't know Ghost Hand is Martin Cleo
He has a safe containing his father Karong's notes and books related to Nyogtha and other Mythos entities

inventory.name: Desert Eagle (1981 custom, gold-inlaid edition, .357 caliber)

properties.clue: Special customized gold version by MRI, internal members only. .357 caliber, matching the caliber of the weapon used in the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case. Ben loves it and carries it everywhere, but rarely uses unless absolutely necessary.

clues.clueText: The Cleo family uses the train station as a front for smuggling and black-market logistics.
Ben enforces a strict rule: conduct business without asking questions about clients' intentions.

Ben has a .357 caliber Desert Eagle that matches the caliber of the weapon used in the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case, but he was actually at a secret gambling session during the murder, not at the church as he claimed.
The Reindeer Bar surveillance system was installed by Ben's people, but it was broken by Martin (Ghost Hand), not by Ben.

relationships.description: Trusted subordinate responsible for guarding the train station entrance.
relationships.history: Haran helped Ben secure power during earlier transitions within the Cleo family.

relationships.description: Occasional business contact acting as a middleman.
relationships.history: They have cooperated when interests aligned but maintain distance.

notes: Ben rarely interacts directly with investigators unless provoked. Any harm done to Haran will eventually provoke retaliation from Ben.
